name: XFormula Fast Speed
description:
XFormula Fast Speed is the best car racer drift adventure games.
Endless car racing and more graphics to choose!
Easy to play and smooth controls
Drive your car with fast speed in the city highway feeling like a drive as in real life and satisfying with your car desires. top new fast speed car is drift based drag simulation for lover to the car.
Features:
.Free to play in google play
.Highway racing themed car game
.Endless fast speed car racing
.Easy and smooth to control
.Realistic 3D quality graphics
.Extremely fast and addictive
.Realistic 3D car driving simulation
.Amazing car sound effects
